instructions: Navigate to '/signup'.
Find the Email input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Email Id"]'.
Type 'John@gmail.com' into the Email input field.
Find the Password input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Password"]'.
Type 'm38rmF$' into the Password input field.
Find the Username input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Username"]'.
Type 'johnd' into the Username input field.
Click the 'Next' button using the CSS selector 'button:contains("Next")'.
Find the First Name input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="First Name"]'.
Type 'John' into the First Name input field.
Find the Last Name input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Last Name"]'.
Type 'Doe' into the Last Name input field.
Find the Phone Number input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Phone Number"]'.
Type '15702367033' into the Phone Number input field.
Find the Address input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Address"]'.
Type '7835 new road, kilcoole' into the Address input field.
Click the 'Sign Up' button using the CSS selector 'button:contains("Sign Up")'.
Verify successful sign-up and redirection to the login screen.
Navigate to '/login'.
Find the Username input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Username"]'.
Type 'vipinkumar6@deloitte.com' into the Username input field.
Find the Password input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Password"]'.
Type '123' into the Password input field.
Click the login button using the CSS selector 'button:contains("Login")'.
Verify successful login and redirection to '/'.
Verify that a token is stored in local storage.
Log in as a user:
Navigate to '/login'.
Find the Username input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Username"]'.
Type 'johnd' into the Username input field.
Find the Password input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Password"]'.
Type 'm38rmF$' into the Password input field.
Click the login button.
Verify successful login and redirection to '/event-list'.
Navigate to '/event-list'.
Find the search input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Search events..."]'.
Type 'Conference' into the search input field.
Verify that the events list is filtered to show only 'Conference' events.
Log in as a user:
Navigate to '/login'.
Find the Username input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Username"]'.
Type 'johnd' into the Username input field.
Find the Password input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Password"]'.
Type 'm38rmF$' into the Password input field.
Click the login button.
Verify successful login and redirection to '/event-list'.
Navigate to '/event-details/1'.
Verify that the event details are displayed correctly.
Click the 'Register' button using the CSS selector 'button:contains("REGISTER")'.
Verify that the button text changes to 'REGISTERED' and no further action is possible.
Log in as a user:
Navigate to '/login'.
Find the Username input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Username"]'.
Type 'johnd' into the Username input field.
Find the Password input field using the CSS selector 'input[placeholder="Password"]'.
Type 'm38rmF$' into the Password input field.
Click the login button.
Verify successful login and redirection to '/event-list'.
Navigate to '/create-event'.
Find the Event Name input field using the CSS selector 'input#event-name'.
Type 'Sample Event' into the Event Name input field.
Find the Event Type dropdown using the CSS selector 'select#event-type'.
Select 'Conference' from the Event Type dropdown.
Find the Tagline input field using the CSS selector 'input#tagline'.
Type 'Sample Tagline' into the Tagline input field.
Find the Email input field using the CSS selector 'input#email'.
Type 'sample@example.com' into the Email input field.
Find the Phone Number input field using the CSS selector 'input#phone-number'.
Type '1234567890' into the Phone Number input field.
Find the Start Date & Time input field using the CSS selector 'input#start-date-time'.
Type '2023-10-10T10:00' into the Start Date & Time input field.
Find the Organizer input field using the CSS selector 'input#organizer'.
Type 'Sample Organizer' into the Organizer input field.
Find the Image Url input field using the CSS selector 'input#image-folder-path'.
Type 'path/to/image' into the Image Url input field.
Find the Ticket Price input field using the CSS selector 'input#ticket-price'.
Type '50' into the Ticket Price input field.
Find the Address Line 1 input field using the CSS selector 'input#address1'.
Type '123 Main St' into the Address Line 1 input field.
Find the City input field using the CSS selector 'input#city'.
Type 'Sample City' into the City input field.
Find the State input field using the CSS selector 'input#state'.
Type 'Sample State' into the State input field.
Find the Zip Code input field using the CSS selector 'input#zip-code'.
Type '12345' into the Zip Code input field.
Find the Country input field using the CSS selector 'input#country'.
Type 'Sample Country' into the Country input field.
Find the Latitude input field using the CSS selector 'input#lat'.
Type '12.3456' into the Latitude input field.
Find the Longitude input field using the CSS selector 'input#long'.
Type '65.4321' into the Longitude input field.
Click the 'Create Event' button using the CSS selector 'button:contains("Create Event")'.
Verify that the event is created and listed in the events list.
